Package interactr.cs.kuleuven.be.ui.control

Class DiagramWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • interactr.cs.kuleuven.be.ui.control.SubWindow
      • interactr.cs.kuleuven.be.ui.control.DiagramWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommandHandler

    public class DiagramWindow
extends SubWindow
    A class of diagram windows with a series of diagram views.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      DiagramWindow​()
      Initialize this new diagram window without any diagram window.
      DiagramWindow​(DiagramWindow diagramWindow)
      Create a new subwindow with a default frame of size 400x400 as a duplicate of the given subwindow.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DiagramWindow

        public DiagramWindow​()
        Initialize this new diagram window without any diagram window.

      • DiagramWindow

        public DiagramWindow​(DiagramWindow diagramWindow)
        Create a new subwindow with a default frame of size 400x400 as a duplicate of the given subwindow. If the given subwindow is null, a subwindow with a new (empty) diagram is created. Otherwise the diagram of the given subwindow is adopted by this new subwindow.
        Parameters:
        diagramWindow - The subwindow that is to be duplicated by this subwindow.

    • Method Detail
